programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 24 and drawn three of their last 27 home games against Espanyol in LaLiga, winning the last 10, the best unbeaten run and winning streak at home against Espanyol in their history in the competition. Espanyol have lost 108 of their 178 matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga, the highest number of defeats suffered by any team against another in the history of the competition.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs Atalanta BC - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1 - Mini Match
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions.The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase.The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Arena in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Sunderland have won just one of their last 12 league meetings with Aston Villa, although that was the most recent Premier League game between the pair in January 2016. Aston Villa completed a league double over Sunderland when they last faced in 2017-18 in the Championship and could win three in a row in the league against the Black Cats for the first time since December 2009 under Martin O’Neill.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.desc: FC Barcelona have not lost any of their 20 home games against Getafe in LaLiga ; only against Elche have they played more home matches without defeat in the competitions history. Getafe have picked up points in five of their last 10 LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, once more than in their previous 21 matches against the Catalans in the competition.

programme.title: Fulham vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Fulham completed a Premier League double over Brentford last season and are looking to win three league games in a row over the Bees for the second time, after winning their first three clashes from 1928 to 1929. programme.title: Manchester City vs Napoli - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: All four of the previous meetings between Manchester City and Napoli in Europe have been in the group stage of the UEFA Champions League. The Citizens went winless in 2011-12, before winning home and away against them in 2017-18. OL could make it six wins in a row for the first time against SCO in Ligue 1. Lyon lost against Rennes last time out but have only suffered back-to-back defeats in Ligue 1 once in the past year, at the end of last season.

programme.title: Nantes vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Since their promotion in 2013/14, Nantes have won only 16.7% of their matches against Rennes in Ligue 1. Les Canaris have lost seven of their last nine matches against SRFC. Nantes won their last home game against Rennes in Ligue 1 but have not won twice on the spin at home against les Rouge et Noir in the top-flight since 1999-2005.

programme.title: Lens vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Lens have lost each of their last three matches against Lille in Ligue 1 but have never conceded four defeats in a row in the derby du Nord in the top-flight. Lens have won just one of their last 10 home matches against Lille in Ligue 1, a 1-0 win at Bollaert-Delelis on September 18, 2021.

programme.title: SK Slavia Praha vs FK Bodø/Glimt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: Slavia Prague will face Norwegian opposition for just the second time in European competition during this fixture, drawing their only prior such match vs Viking 2-2 during the 2005-06 UEFA Cup. Bodø/Glimt have won each of their prior two European clashes with Czech opponents, beating Bohemians 1905 twice during UEFA Conference League qualifying in 2023-24.

programme.title: Juventus vs Borussia Dortmund - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the 10th meeting between Juventus and Borussia Dortmund in European competition, with the Old Lady winning six of the previous nine and only losing twice. Borussia Dortmund have lost five of their last six away games against Italian sides in the UEFA Champions League. This includes a 2-1 defeat at Bologna last season, which was the only victory the Rossoblù managed in eight games during the league phase.

programme.title: Le Havre vs Lorient - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Le Havre have scored three goals in each of their last two Ligue 1 matches against Lorient and could reach three consecutive games with at least three goals against the same team in the top-flight for the first time in their history. Le Havre have scored 2.1 goals per game at home against Lorient in all competitions, their best average against a current Ligue 1 team.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – thats more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Velodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Auxerre vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5

programme.title: Buriram United (THA) vs Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD

programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. programme.title: SuperTri Jersey/London - Super Tri 2025
Burnley vs Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Both sides have scored in six of the last seven league meetings between Burnley and Nottingham Forest, with the only exception a 1-0 win for the Clarets in the Championship in February 2016. After their 2-1 win at Turf Moor on the final day of the 2023-24 season, Nottingham Forest could win back-to-back league meetings against Burnley for the first time since September 2003, and first time in the top-flight since March 1967. The Tricky Trees have never previously won back-to-back league visits to Burnley, with this their 52nd trip.

programme.title: Brest vs Nice - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Brest have won only one of their last nine matches against Nice in Ligue 1, a 1-0 success on April 16, 2023 at Francis-Le Ble. It was also the last time that the Bretons managed to score a goal against Les Aiglons in the top-flight. There have been 1.1 goals per game between Brest and Nice at Francis-Le Ble in Ligue 1 in the 21st century, the lowest average between two current top-flight teams in the same venue over that period.

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring
Practice 2 - F1 Qatar Airways Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: The most representative 60-minute session for race prep. Squads refine power-unit modes, test fuel-corrected long runs, and tune drag vs. downforce for the 6.003 km layout. Focus: brake stability into Turn 1, traction through the infield, and ERS deployment for overtakes. Data here frames tyre choice and pit windows for Sunday.

programme.title: Practice 3 - F1 Qatar Airways Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: Final 60 minutes before qualifying. Low-fuel laps chase peak grip as track evolution ramps up. Drivers rehearse the tow on the 2.2 km main straight, fine-tune braking for the castle section, and validate tyre warm-up. Millimetres from the barriers decide tenths; a clean read here sets confidence for Q1–Q3.

programme.title: GP Confidential 2025 Magazine
programme.desc: Explore the sporting secrets of F1. Across 25 episodes and in crisp 3D animations, we analyses the technical details, which decide which teams make the most of the rules - and which need to go back to the drawing board. Complemented by features on historical milestones as well as race previews - GP Confidential is the perfect treat for any F1 fan.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship - Baku Round -2025
programme.desc: Strategy takes centre stage: one mandatory stop, undercut vs overcut dictated by tyre life and interruptions. Clean in- and out-laps, smart Safety Car timing, and measured aggression in the closing laps decide the 25-point prize. Energy management down the endless main straight unlocks decisive DRS passes for the win.

programme.title: Sprint Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship - Baku Round -2025
programme.desc: Reverse-grid Sprint magnifies race-craft—no mandatory stop. Launch, tyre warm-up and ERS timing into Turn 1 set early gains. Survival through Safety Cars can catapult a P8–P10 starter into podium contention. With 10 points for the win, clean restarts and late-race patience are vital on a circuit that punishes tiny errors.

programme.title: Main Race - F1 Qatar Airways Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: 51 laps of high-risk street racing. Safety Cars compress strategies, making tyre calls and restarts pivotal. One-stop plans can flip with interruptions; leaders defend ERS and unleash DRS down the main straight for decisive moves. Brake temps, wall proximity, and calm under pressure define who masters Baku when it counts.

programme.title: EN EPL Rewind 2025/26 | E3
Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Fulham vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Fulham completed a Premier League double over Brentford last season and are looking to win three league games in a row over the Bees for the second time, after winning their first three clashes from 1928 to 1929. Brentford have lost two of their three Premier League visits to Craven Cottage, more than their previous 15 league trips to Fulham beforehand, while they could lose twice in a row at Fulham in the league for the first time since January 1954.

programme.title: EN EPL The Big Interview 2025/26 | E6
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal out and about interviews with the Premier Leagues biggest names.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Sunderland have won just one of their last 12 league meetings with Aston Villa, although that was the most recent Premier League game between the pair in January 2016. Aston Villa completed a league double over Sunderland when they last faced in 2017-18 in the Championship and could win three in a row in the league against the Black Cats for the first time since December 2009 under Martin O’Neill.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.desc: A recap of the best of the action, plus a look forward to the next Match Day in Europe’s premium football competition, the UEFA Champions League. All matches from the UEFA Champions League are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – thats more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Velodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Main Race Qualifying - F1 Qatar Airways Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: Three-phase knockout on a slipstream-sensitive circuit. Timing the tow can swing rows on the grid, but precision through the castle complex and a tidy final sector are non-negotiable. Track evolution is high; banker laps matter. Pole is often decided by tenths, with teamwork and traffic management crucial to clear air.

programme.title: Main Race - F1 Qatar Airways Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: 51 laps of high-risk street racing. Safety Cars compress strategies, making tyre calls and restarts pivotal. One-stop plans can flip with interruptions; leaders defend ERS and unleash DRS down the main straight for decisive moves. Brake temps, wall proximity, and calm under pressure define who masters Baku when it counts.

programme.title: Montpellier vs Chambery - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Sadd vs Al Wakrah - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W5
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.
